instructions: Open a location or an existing folder. Drag down from the center of the screen, tap the More button , then tap New Folder. Note: If you don t see New Folder, you can t create a folder in that location.
Touch and hold the file or folder, tap Tags, then tap one or more tags. Tap Done.

Check if the equipment is compatible you ll see Connects with Apple Watch or Connect with Apple Watch on the equipment. Make sure your watch is set to detect gym equipment open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone, tap My Watch, tap Workout, then turn on Detect Gym Equipment. Hold your Apple Watch within a few centimeters of the contactless reader on the gym equipment, with the display facing the reader. A gentle tap and beep confirm that your Apple Watch is paired.
